title: To the Lighthouse: Virginia Woolf's Modernist Novel
summary: A 1927 novel about the Ramsay family's experiences in Scotland spanning 1910-1920
content: modernist novel published in 1927, centers on Ramsay family summer house in Scotland, deals with death of Mrs. Ramsay, uses shifting character perspectives, explores inner thoughts of characters, set between 1910-1920, takes place on Isle of Skye
